name: Pieter Peers
content: Pieter Peers Home Bio Publications Code CV Contact information Location: Computer Science Department, College of William & Mary McGlothlin-Street Hall 115 Williamsburg, VA, 23187 USA Email: News 10.10.2025: Teamwork (SIGGRAPH Asia 2025) is now available. 05.29.2025: RenderFormer (SIGGRAPH 2025) is now available! 05.28.2025: Our CVPR paper on scibble driven lighting control is now available. 09.24.2024 Our SIGGRAPH Asia 2024 paper is now available. 06.30.2024 Our SIGGRAPH 2024 paper on Lighting Control for Diffusion Models is now available.
